description:
Through the battle with Minato Sakai, Sekai and Fumina have realized what they need to do, and they quickly begin working towards the championship. Meanwhile, in order to keep his promise to Fumina, Yuuma is building power-up equipment for his Lightning Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akogare to Chousen o Mune ni
Dream and Challenge In Your Heart
